Container.Name: unraid-simple-monitoring-api
Container.Overview:
A simple REST API to monitor basic metrics such as Disk utilization and Network traffic. Initially created for use with https://gethomepage.dev/
===== Configuration ===== By default the application expects a configuration file in /mnt/user/appdata/unraid-simple-monitoring-api/conf.yml
You can find an example file here (https://github.com/NebN/unraid-simple-monitoring-api/blob/master/conf/conf.yml)
===== Utilization ===== Make a request to http://your-unraid-ip:24940

Config.Name: Main API Port
Config.Description: Port through which the API communicates

Config.Name: Root path of Unraid
Config.Description: Root path for the container to be able to read the host's data. It is read only.
